title: Design and Application of Distributed Deep Learning Based on 6G Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Networking fundamentals, machine learning concepts, programming proficiency (Python/TensorFlow)
context.additional_context: Theory-practice integrated design for leveraging the work experience of adult learners aged 40+.

learning_goals: Apply the ultra-reliable low-latency communication (uRLLC) characteristics of 6G networks to distributed deep learning systems.
Design a CNN model training process utilizing weighted grouping strategies under heterogeneous edge device environments.
A reliable model verification system can be established through a blockchain-based dual consensus mechanism
Knowledge levels can be enhanced by implementing a two-tier parameter aggregation method linking macro/small base stations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
